messages.subject: Re: College bound Question/ For Valerie andAll
messages.msgSnippet: I m not sure if I should be so crude but....this thread is making me feel like we should all sit around together and burp aloud! love, Valerie ... respect ...
messages.messageBody:

feel like we should all sit around together and burp aloud!

love, Valerie
